summary: Lizzie McGuire has graduated from middle school and takes a trip to Rome, Italy with her class. And what was supposed to be only a normal trip, becomes a teenager's dream come true.
cast: Hilary Duff|Adam Lamberg|Hallie Todd|Robert Carradine|Jake Thomas|Ashlie Brillault|Clayton Snyder|Alex Borstein|Yani Gellman|Brendan Kelly|Carly Schroeder|Daniel Escobar|Jody Racicot|Peter Kelamis|Terra C. title: Lizzie Superstar
